outputs.output_descr:
1. support available for designing climate change strategies and investment plans, programmes, and or/or related products
2. capacities strengthened for integrating climate change risks and opportunities into national development assistance
3. countries supported in their preparations for and substantive engagement with UNFCCC negotiations across the key negotiation themes including climate finance
4. countries supported in mainstreaming climate change into UNDP portfolio and programming


Integrating CC risks into Development and Planning - Based on budget revision of UNOPS dated 9 December, the actual start date of the project for fiscal year 2011 is 01/01/2011 and end date is 31/12/2011

project_descr: Integrating climate change risks into development planning and programming (ICCP)
project_title: Integrating CC Risks into Dev. Planning & Programming
